concept.title: Reference
concept.shortdesc: An explanation of the Reference DITA information type.

conbody.p: The Reference topic is one of the three base DITA information types.

li.p: Used to describe features of sets of things, such as codes, types, and commands.
Information that demands tabular presentation often belongs in reference topics.

section.title: Content
section.p: Reference topics contain facts without explanation.

section.title: Root Element
section.p: The root element of a Reference topic is <reference>.
